refnamediv.refpurpose: A non-linear filter system to excite the signal.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: "Filtered distortion to add brilliance to a signal"

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ares exciter asig, kfreq, kceil, kharmonics, kblend

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kfreq -- the lower end of the harmonics created.
kceil -- the upper end of the harmonics created.
kharmonics -- amount of harmonics in the range 0.1 - 10.
kblend -- blend between 2nd and 3rd order harmonics in the range -10 - +10.
exciter is a reimplementation of the calf exciter plugin.
